Note:
CHAR POSITION - X-axis (16-bit)
GOAL POST
Lethal Harbor 1 >= 0x3da0
Magma Factory 1 >= 0x3e20
Forbidden Ruins 1 >= 0x3f20
Neo Utopia 1 >= 0x3f20
Cryptic Desert 1 >= 0x3f20
Twinkle Slider 1 >= 0x3ad0
Dark Jungle 1 >= 0x3ea0
Iron Abyss 1 >= 0x3e20

CHAR FLIP (8-bit)
0x00=Facing to Right
0x01=Facing to Left

BOX (8-bit)
Bit0 = Shield
Bit1 = Invincibility
Bit2 = Super Speed
Bit7 = Sliding

SPECIAL STAGE (8-bit)
Metal Sonic / Knuckles, Tens

SPECIAL STAGE (8-bit)
Metal Sonic / Knuckles, Hundreds

SPECIAL STAGE (8-bit)
Metal Sonic / Knuckles, Ones

SPECIAL STAGE (8-bit)
(x) Rings to go!, Ones

SPECIAL STAGE (8-bit)
(x) Rings to go!, Tens

FINAL RESULT (8-bit)
Bonus Countdown
Next Stage Countdown

SPECIAL STAGE - Emerald (8-bit)
0x02=Emerald on the screen
0x06=Not enough rings...
0x08=Got a chaos emerald

SPECIAL STAGE - Emerald (8-bit)
0x77=Not enough rings...
0x80=Got a chaos emerald

SPECIAL STAGE - Dislike (8-bit)
0x86 = Not enough rings

SPECIAL STAGE - Emerald (8-bit)
0x02=Emerald on the screen
0x06=Not enough rings...
0x08=Got a chaos emerald

SPECIAL STAGE - Emerald (8-bit)
0x77=Not enough rings...
0x80=Got a chaos emerald

Special Stage 6

SPECIAL STAGE (16-bit)
0x0000 = Catching rings yet
!= 0x0000 = Step completed

CAMERA - X-axis (16-bit)
LAST SCREEN
Lethal Harbor 1 = 0x3d00
Lethal Harbor 2 = 0x3c00
Magma Factory 1 = 0x3d80
Magma Factory 2 >= 0x3880
Forbidden Ruins 1 = 0x3e80
Forbidden Ruins 2 = 0x3a40
Neo Utopia 1 = 0x3e80
Neo Utopia 2 = 0x3a20
Cryptic Desert 1 = 0x3e80
Cryptic Desert 2 = 0x20f0
Twinkle Slider 1 = 0x3a30
Twinkle Slider 2 >= 0x2860
Dark Jungle 1 = 0x3e00
Dark Jungle 2 >= 0x2ee0
Iron Abyss 1 = 0x3d80
Iron Abyss 2 >= 0x3df0
Iron Abyss 3 >= 0x2a80
Orbital Colony = 0x3c00
Final Act (1st Part) = 0x01e0 
Final Act (Last Boss) >= 0x0680

0x08 = Lone Devil presents
0x04 = Main Menu
0x8c -> 0x0c = Demo
0x90 -> 0x10 = Playing
0x28 = Options
0x2c = Select Stage
0x14 = Special Stage
0x24 = Ending

D-PAD - Bitflags (8-bit)
Bit0 = Up
Bit1 = Down
Bit2 = Left
Bit3 = Right
Bit4 = B
Bit5 = C
Bit6 = A
Bit7 = Start

D-PAD - 2P Bitflags (8-bit)
Bit0 = Up
Bit1 = Down
Bit2 = Left
Bit3 = Right
Bit4 = B
Bit5 = C
Bit6 = A
Bit7 = Start

TIME (8-bit)
Useful to special stage
Special Stage 1-1 = 0xac -> 0xab
Special Stage 1-2 = 0x4c -> 0x4b
Special Stage 2-1 = 0xa4 -> 0xa3
Special Stage 2-2 = 0x4c -> 0x4b
Special Stage 3-1 = 0x8c -> 0x8b
Special Stage 3-2 = 0x34 -> 0x33
Special Stage 4-1 = 0xac -> 0xab
Special Stage 4-2 = 0x6c -> 0x6b
Special Stage 5-1 = 0xa4 -> 0xa3
Special Stage 5-2 = 0x54 -> 0x53
Special Stage 6-1 = 0x84 -> 0x83
Special Stage 6-2 = 0x0c -> 0x0b
Special Stage 7-1 = 0x7c -> 0x7b
Special Stage 7-2 = 0x24 -> 0x23

STAGE (16-bit)
0x0000=Lethal Harbor 1
0x0001=Lethal Harbor 2
0x0a00=Magma Factory 1
0x0a01=Magma Factory 2
0x0f00=Forbidden Ruins 1
0x0f01=Forbidden Ruins 2
0x0800=Neo Utopia 1
0x0801=Neo Utopia 2
0x0b00=Cryptic Desert 1
0x0b01=Cryptic Desert 2
0x0c00=Twinkle Slider 1
0x0c01=Twinkle Slider 2
0x0700=Dark Jungle 1
0x0701=Dark Jungle 2
0x0400=Iron Abyss 1
0x0401=Iron Abyss 2
0x0500=Iron Abyss 3
0x0d00=Orbital Colony
0x0e00=Final Act
None=Special Stage

SPECIAL STAGE - Progression (8-bit)
0x00=Starting
0x01=1st part
0x02=2nd part
0x03=3rd part

HAS PASSED ACT (8-bit)
0x01 -> 0x00

Warning: Game over and Time over will work too.
